SYSTEM REQUIREMENT:

A new milestone in the history of vampire hunters c creatures of darkness
 and a new stage in the history of the famous series Castlevania. When was
 the end of time, the Earth was at the mercy of the forces of darkness and
 the mysterious Lords of Shadow. Countries ravaged by wandering souls of
 the dead who can not find peace, and mysterious creatures have sown death
 and destruction among the survivors. The player will become a Gabriel - one
 of the knights of the Brotherhood of Light, an organization of holy warriors
 to protect humanity from the forces of evil. His wife fell victim to the 
creatures of darkness, but her soul is laid to rest. Realizing that the danger
 looming over the world, she took the right decision - to send Gabriel on the 
path to salvation of mankind.


Repack Features
